content:
1.4 Summary Description of the Project

The project activity is a Grid connected wind power project implemented in Rajasthan, India. The total capacity of the bundled project activity is 59.4 MW which consist 39.9 MW in Jaisalmer district & 19.5 MW in Pratapgarh District of Rajasthan. The project is promoted by “Orange Jaisalmer Wind Energy Private Limited” & “Orange Renewable Power Private Limited” of which the “Orange Renewable Power Private Limited” (ORPPL) is the representative of this bundled project. The purpose of the project activity is to generate clean electricity with utilization of wind energy. The details of the bundled project are given below:

PPs Orange Jaisalmer Wind | Orange Renewable Power Energy Private Limited Private Limited Location Jaisalmer District Pratapgarh District Capacity of each WTG 2.1 MW 1.5 MW WTG Make Suzlon ReGen Model Number S88 V82 Total Number of WTGs 19 13 Total Capacity 39.9 MW 19.5 MW Commissioning Date 31-March-2013 31-March-2013

All the WTGs are commissioned on 31-March-2013 and the same is verified through commissioning certificates. The project activity is to harness the renewable resources of wind power and thereby displace equivalent electricity from the fossil fuel dominated NEWNE grid. The exact geographical locations of the WTGs mentioned in the MR has been checked during the site visit.
